config.name: Currency
config.description: Track user balances and allow them to deposit and withdraw.

config.name: Friends
config.description: Allow users to send and accept friend requests.

send_request.name: Send Request
send_request.description: Send a friend request to another user.

accept_request.name: Accept Request
accept_request.description: Accept a friend request from another user.

decline_request.name: Decline Request
decline_request.description: Decline a friend request from another user.

remove_friend.name: Remove Friend
remove_friend.description: Remove a friend from your friends list.

list_friends.name: List Friends
list_friends.description: List all friends of a user.

list_outgoing_friend_requests.name: List Outgoing Friend Requests
list_outgoing_friend_requests.description: List all friend requests sent by a user.

list_incoming_friend_requests.name: List Incoming Friend Requests
list_incoming_friend_requests.description: List all friend requests received by a user.

config.name: Send Request

config.name: Decline Request
config.description: Decline a friend request from another user.

config.name: Remove Friend
config.description: Remove a friend from your friends list.

config.description: List all friends of a user.

config.name: List Outgoing Friend Requests
config.description: List all friend requests sent by a user.

config.name: Rate Limit
config.description: Prevent abuse by limiting request rate.

throttle.name: Throttle
throttle.description: Limit the amount of times an request can be made by a given key.

throttle_public.name: Throttle Public
throttle_public.description: Limit the amount of times a public request can be made by a given key. This will rate limit based off the user's IP address.

config.name: Throttle
config.description: Limit the amount of times an request can be made by a given key.

config.name: Throttle Public
config.description: Limit the amount of times a public request can be made by a given key. This will rate limit based off the user's IP address.

config.name: Tokens
config.description: Create & verify tokens for authorization purposes.

fetch.name: Fetch Token
fetch.description: Get a token by its ID.

fetch_by_token.name: Fetch by Token
fetch_by_token.description: Get a token by its secret token.

revoke.name: Revoke Token
revoke.description: Revoke a token, preventing it from being used again.

validate.name: Validate Token
validate.description: Validate a token. Throws an error if the token is invalid.

extend.name: Extend Token
extend.description: Extend or remove the expiration date of a token. (Only works on valid tokens.)

config.name: Fetch Token

config.name: Fetch by Token

config.name: Revoke Token
config.description: Revoke a token, preventing it from being used again.

config.name: Validate Token
config.description: Validate a token. Throws an error if the token is invalid.

config.name: Extend Token
config.description: Extend or remove the expiration date of a token. (Only works on valid tokens.)

config.name: Users
config.description: Identify and manage users.

authenticate_token.name: Authenticate User Token
authenticate_token.description: Validate a user token. Throws an error if the token is invalid.

create_token.name: Create User Token
create_token.description: Create a token for a user to authenticate future requests.

config.name: Authenticate User Token
config.description: Validate a user token. Throws an error if the token is invalid.

config.name: Create User Token
config.description: Create a token for a user to authenticate future requests.

config.name: Uploads
config.description: Upload & store blobs of data.

prepare.name: Prepare Upload
prepare.description: Prepare an upload batch for data transfer

complete.name: Complete Upload
complete.description: Alert the module that the upload has been completed

get.name: Get Upload Metadata
get.description: Get the metadata (including contained files) for specified upload IDs

get_public_file_urls.name: Get File Link
get_public_file_urls.description: Get presigned download links for each of the specified files

delete.name: Delete Upload
delete.description: Removes the upload and deletes the files from the bucket

no_files.name: No Files Provided
no_files.description: An upload must have at least 1 file

too_many_files.name: Too Many Files Provided
too_many_files.description: There is a limit to how many files can be put into a single upload (see config)

duplicate_paths.name: Duplicate Paths Provided
duplicate_paths.description: An upload cannot contain 2 files with the same paths (see `cause` for offending paths)

size_limit_exceeded.name: Combined Size Limit Exceeded
size_limit_exceeded.description: There is a maximum total size per upload (see config)

upload_not_found.name: Upload Not Found
upload_not_found.description: The provided upload ID didn't match any known existing uploads

upload_already_completed.name: Upload Already completed
upload_already_completed.description: \`complete\` was already called on this upload

s3_not_configured.name: S3 Not Configured
s3_not_configured.description: The S3 bucket is not configured (missing env variables)

too_many_chunks.name: Possibility Of Too Many Chunks
too_many_chunks.description:
AWS S3 has a limit on the number of parts that can be uploaded in a
multipart upload. This limit is 10,000 parts. If the number of chunks
required to upload the maximum multipart upload size exceeds this limit,
any operation will preemptively throw this error.

multipart_upload_completion_fail.name: Multipart Upload Completion Failure
multipart_upload_completion_fail.description: The multipart upload failed to complete (see `cause` for more information)

config.description: Removes the upload and deletes the files from the bucket

config.name: Authentication
config.description: Authenticate users with multiple authentication methods.

send_email_verification.name: Send Email Verification
send_email_verification.description: Send a one-time verification code to a user's email address to authenticate them.

complete_email_verification.name: Complete Email Verification
complete_email_verification.description: Verify a user's email address with a one-time verification code.

config.name: Send Email Verification
config.description: Send a one-time verification code to a user's email address to authenticate them.

config.name: Complete Email Verification
config.description: Verify a user's email address with a one-time verification code.

config.name: Email
config.description: Send emails using multiple providers.

config.name: Lobbies
config.description: Lobby & player management.

find.description: TODO: Doc connect to server asap afterwards.

lobby_create_missing_players.description: When creating a lobby with `config.lobbies.autoDestroyWhenEmpty`, a lobby must be created with players in order to avoid creating an empty lobby.

more_players_than_max.description: More players were passed to the create lobby than the number of max players in a lobby.

player_already_connected.description: The player has already connected to this server. This error helps mitigate botting attacks by only allowing one scoket to connect to a game server for every player.

player_disconnected.description: The player has already disconnected from the server. Create a new player for the specified lobby using the `join` script.
